website_summaries.verdict: This product was designed for maximum ease of use, as the cutter opens between each motion.
pros: Bolts, threaded rods, wire, mesh, chain links, and wire fences can all be cut with this tool
The handle is comfortable and has a built-in lock
cons: A bit heavy despite being a mini bolt cutter, but some users appreciate its heavier feel

customer_reviews.title: Great for cutting cage wire
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to help me cut through sheets of wire to construct rabbit cages and for this purpose they were absolutely wonderful! Having used regular wire cutters before I was super happy to have no blisters or sore hands after using them! They made my job so much easier and more comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Theophanes Avery

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Cutters
customer_reviews.text: My wife has a hard time using diagonal cutters on some of the hard wire she uses in floral arrangements. I decided on these as a solution and they work great for anything up to about 1/8" or so in diameter. Coat hanger wire cuts like butter. Plenty of leverage and they seem well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Max Remley

customer_reviews.title: does not work for chicken wire
customer_reviews.text: We are building a chicken run.... these do not cut the chicken wire!! I'm sure they will cut something.... but just not the really thin wire!
customer_reviews.author: sweethang_86

customer_reviews.title: Great for crafting too
customer_reviews.text: I make wreaths and I can’t use regular wire cutters to cut the wreath forms. These are great! It cuts right through them so easy and I know I will be ordering another pair
customer_reviews.author: Jlw

customer_reviews.title: These things are great.
customer_reviews.text: I think it was a brilliant idea to just scale down a pair of bolt Cutters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Should not be colt bolt cutters
customer_reviews.text: No way will this cut a bolt when it has so much trouble cutting metal clothing hangers.
customer_reviews.author: BBQ_POPE

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I used it to make cages for my chickens. It worked much better than wire cutters.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: I
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as the last pair I had. I think a regular pair of pliers would do the same job
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would barely cut a 16 gauge copper strand wire.
customer_reviews.text: The metal in the jaws are so soft they won't even cut a clothes hanger. Junk ...
customer_reviews.author: EUSKADULNA

customer_reviews.title: It Does what the description says
customer_reviews.text: I was using this to cut green wire fencing it cuts through an through with normal effort. looks sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Good Gardener

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good product for SMALL cuts might have to add a sharper BITE to the jaws but it will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Mootrock

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Heavy, Sharp, it did what it was suppose to do. Con: None My Through: I wasn't expecting much from it but it did what i brought it for and beyond. It very well made.

customer_reviews.title: Will not cut metal.
customer_reviews.text: These will not cut a floral stem or a bolt. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: cheri

product_meta.title: Tech 8” Mini-Bolt Cutter, Wire, Cable, Chain, Spring Loaded Return, Comfortable Grips, Snips, Hand Tools, 8-inch
product_meta.description: Tech 8 inch mini bolt cutters feature heavy-duty chrome vanadium jaws and compound action, along with spring loaded return and TPR grips. The 6.1mm maximum opening can handle 3/16” thick material. Depth-of-cut adjustment screw. Built-in handle lock for convenient, compact storage. The Tech Team 8-inch mini bolt cutters are ideal for cutting wires, cables, chains, chain link fences, wire mesh, threaded rods, chicken wire fencing, fish hooks, and much more. The heavy-duty chrome vanadium jaws and compound action maximize cutting power, while the comfortable, spring-loaded return grip make these bolt cutters easy to use.
feature_bullets: Heat treated, chrome vanadium jaws can cut through bolts, threaded rod, wire, mesh, chain links, wire fence, and more.
Compound action for cutting power with a spring-loaded return that opens the cutter between each cut.
TPR (Thermo Plastic Rubber) handles for comfort and ease of use.
6.1mm maximum opening can handle 3/16” thick material. Depth-of-cut adjustment screw.
Built-in handle lock for convenient, compact storage.
